title: Hitman At Work! Rohit Sharma Continues On His Merry Way With A Special Maiden Double Century
text:
Hitman At Work! Rohit Sharma Continues On His Merry Way With A Special Maiden Double Century

Hitman At Work! Rohit Sharma Continues On His Merry Way With A Special Maiden Double Century

Amid overcast conditions in Ranchi, Rohit Sharma was the light that shone bright and high as he mesmerised on his way to maiden double hundred.

AP

After two hundreds in the opening Test, the dashing opener had zoomed to a special hundred on day one. He resumed the innings on day two and looked in great touch as he trounced South African bowlers all around the park to his first double ton in Tests.

It was another special knock from Rohit who has looked right at ease opening the batting for India in the longest format of the game.

His innings of 212 was full of poise, control and swagger. The Hitman as he is known, got to his double hundred with a trademark pull shot that went all the way for maximum.

Don't Miss 1.5 K SHARES 830 SHARES

AFP

On a day when Virender Sehwag celebrates his birthday, Rohit Sharma brought back the memories of former Indian opener as he smashed the ball out of the park to get to the milestone. His 212 run knock came of just 255 balls, at a strike rate of 83.14.

It was another dominant knock from Rohit Sharma, who seems to be in rich vein of form and continues to pile on the big runs.

He looked set for a triple hundred but was unfortunately caught off the pull shot at fine leg. After his dismissal, Jadeja and Umesh Yadav's quick fire cameo saw India post 497 on the board before declaring.

In response, South Africa lost both their openers and are 2 for 9 at stumps on day 2.
